original_title: Die Kryptoqueen - Der grosse OneCoin Betrug
overview: The OneCoin scam is one of the biggest financial scandals in history. The cryptocurrency fraud functioned like a gigantic snowball system, designed by a glamorous German-Bulgarian with lots of criminal energy and good connections. The film tells the incredible story of Ruja Ignatova’s meteoric rise to become the shining star of the investment world – and her spectacular downfall.
title: The Cryptoqueen
